description:
Top-of-the-line cables, built with the quality and care you expect from Dura-Ace components.

  • Combination polymer-coated cables, with pre-lubricated casings to improve glide
  • Sealed end caps provide mud protection
  • 1 polymer coated stainless steel inner cable ø 1.6mm x 2000mm
  • 1 polymer coated stainless steel inner cable ø 1.6mm x 1600mm
  • 2 outer caps with short tongue
  • 2 inner cable end caps
  • 1 cable housing of 1800mm and one cable housing of 800mm
name: Shimano Polymer Coated Dura-Ace Brake Cable Set
